title: The education or bringinge vp of children, translated oute of Plutarche by syr Thomas Eliot knyght
author: Plutarch.
publisher: In Fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the Cundite, at the sygne of Lucrece,
notes: A translation of: De educatione puerorum.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
